    -threads $TOTAL_THREADS \

    $RAW_FASTQ_DIR/SRR12804464_2.fastq.gz \
    $PE_TRIM_DIR/SRR12804464_1_trimmed.fastq.gz \

    $PE_TRIM_DIR/SRR12804464_2_trimmed.fastq.gz \
    $PE_TRIM_DIR/SRR12804464_2_unpaired.fastq.gz \
    ILLUMINACLIP:TruSeq2-PE.fa:2:30:10:2:keepBothReads LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 MINLEN:36
